enterprise_cloud_database_create_title: Create a cluster Enterprise Cloud Databases
enterprise_cloud_database_create_descrip: Highly available managed databases, based on a dedicated and scalable hardware infrastructure. Our database clusters are replicated across geographies and have automatic fail-over mechanisms and daily backups. Each cluster has its own dedicated physical resources to take advantage of the power of our latest generation hardware. Give your users optimal performance applications.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_choose_: A database cluster runs a single database engine that powers one or more individual databases.
Generally, choose the region where your applications are located. If the database cluster is located in a different region, added latency may slow performance.
You will be able to add, remove, or resize nodes at any time after the cluster is created.
{{ numDefaultNodes }} dedicated nodes are included by default
enterprise_cloud_database_create_additio: You will be able to add, remove, or resize replicas at any time after the cluster is created. 1 replica is included by default.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_billing: Your default payment method will be used to pay this order.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_success: Your order has been approved successfully. Once delivered, your cluster will appear in this page. You can track your order delivery in the Control Panel, My Orders section.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_error: Failed to create Enterprise Cloud Database: {{ message }}
enterprise_cloud_database_create_order_e: An error occurred while trying to create an order : {{ message }}
enterprise_cloud_database_no_default_pay: No default payment method found. You will need to set a default payment method to create a Enterprise Cloud Database. Set a default payment method
enterprise_cloud_database_create_commitm: The service is automatically renewed after the commitment period and billed to your default payment method. You can change this in your account under «My services».
enterprise_cloud_database_create_confirm: Enterprise Cloud Database cluster will be created after the payment. This action takes approximately 1 hour to complete.
Below payment method will be used for this order and for future renewals
You can change your renewal options at any time in your account under «My services»
